heisigStory: Wholeness suggests physical and spiritual health, "having your act together." The kanji-image for wholeness depicts being "king under your own umbrella," that is, giving order to your own life. I know it sounds terribly abstract, but what could be more abstract than the word whole?
koohiiStory1: The fat king hogs the whole space under his umbrella. (tweaked version of radical tyro´s story. "fat" makes a more vivid image for me.).
koohiiStory2: The king takes up the whole space under his umbrella.
myStory: toàn thế. vua dưới mái nhà là toàn thể của vua
words: wholly, entirely, completely, not at all (with neg. verb)
all, the whole, entirely, in general, wholly
all members (unanimity), all hands, the whole crew
all, whole, entire, complete, overall, pan-
really, truly, entirely, completely, wholly, perfectly, indeed
